v1.about:
As a Forbes Technology Council member and Cutting Edge tech expert, I help startups, SMEs, and enterprises scale smarter through AI, Cloud, Data, and Engineering solutions.

Whether you’re launching a new SaaS product, migrating legacy infrastructure, or building AI-enabled features, I lead the delivery of future-ready solutions tailored to your needs.

At Addo, as a founding member I grew the team from 3 to 300+, delivered 170+ enterprise-scale projects, expanded from Singapore to ASEAN, MiddleEast, Austrailia, Europe and USA, helped and lead Google, AWS, Microsoft, KPMG, Salesforce and Mastercard partnerships and developed an exceptional team. 

Previously, as the CEO and CTO of two professional services startups, I built scalable technology platforms, streamlined operations, and achieved 10x revenue growth within just two years. These experiences shaped my belief that innovation is the key to staying ahead in a rapidly evolving world.

My experience spans Fortune 500s, startups, and scaleups in industries like fintech, telco, healthcare, retail, and smart cities.

▸ Keynote Speaker on AI, Cloud & Innovation
▸ 15+ years across 20+ tech stacks
▸ Certified SAFe, PMP, 2x AWS Cloud Architect, ScrumMaster

Let’s build something remarkable.
v1.headline:
From pilot to production, I help startups to build faster, smarter and future-proof with AI + Data.
| Keynote Speaker | Forbes Tech Council
